trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece painéis de cada lado do formulário e um painel central que pode conter um ou mais controles.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripContainer é semelhante ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>

trans-unit.source: It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa quatro painéis encaixados lado (instâncias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) e um painel central (uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) para criar uma organização típica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover os painéis de lado, mas você pode ocultá-las, definindo suas respectivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A>propriedades `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, cada uma dessas propriedades é `true` em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the ToolStripContainer appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: Também em tempo de design, ToolStripContainer aparece com seu painel superior estiver expandido.

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover nem ocultar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode organizar uma ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controles em painéis de lado e você podem usar o painel central para outros controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>também fornece uma maneira de obter o suporte do processador para o corpo do formulário para uma aparência consistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip não oferece suporte a aplicativos de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>para aplicativos MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the BottomToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de BottomToolStripPanel ao adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controles ou movê-los de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> que representa o painel inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> está visível.

trans-unit.source: Set the BottomToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade BottomToolStripPanelVisible como `false` para usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>sem um painel inferior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o painel inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> estiver visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel central do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a parte superior, inferior, esquerda e direita painéis do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>para manter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Controles que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>são adicionados automaticamente à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnSizeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnSizeChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de TopToolStripPanel ao adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controles ou movê-los de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> que representa o painel superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> está visível.

trans-unit.source: Set the TopToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a top panel.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade TopToolStripPanelVisible como `false` para usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>sem um painel superior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the top panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o painel superior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> estiver visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
